subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: For the second time in three nights, the Knicks spent a fourth quarter with their starters on the bench, only this time, they were stewing, hurting and dismayed as they watched the Pacers dominate.
snippet: For the second time in three nights, the Knicks spent a fourth quarter with their starters on the bench, only this time, they were stewing, hurting and dismayed as they watched the Pacers dominate.
